name: Midjourney
description: Midjourney is a highly acclaimed AI image generation service renowned for its unique, artistic, and often surreal visual style. It operates primarily through the Discord chat platform, though a dedicated web interface is increasingly available.

paid_tiers.name: Standard Plan
paid_tiers.description: More 'Fast' GPU time, access to 'Relax' mode.

paid_tiers.name: Pro Plan
paid_tiers.description: Even more 'Fast' GPU time, higher concurrent jobs, Stealth Mode.

pricing.notes: Plans offer varying amounts of Fast GPU hours and concurrent job limits. Relax mode offers unlimited, slower generations on higher tiers.

pros: Produces highly artistic and detailed images
Excellent style and character consistency features
Relatively easy prompts yield impressive results
cons: Requires paid subscription for significant use
Less granular control than some tools (e.g., Stable Diffusion)
Can struggle with legible text in images

performance_metrics.accuracy: High visual quality, prompt adherence varies

security_compliance.data_protection: Governed by Terms of Service. Generated images typically public unless using Stealth Mode (paid feature).
